entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain with thunderstorms possible, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low.

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale northwesterlies gusting 120 km/h in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 90 to 110 mm of rain about the main divide, and 50 to 80 mm within 15 km farther east. Peak rates of 20 to 30 mm/h expected about the divide with possible thunderstorms. Freezing level above 3000 metres. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect a further 50 to 70 mm of rain, with thunderstorms possible. Peak rates of 20 to 30 mm/h expected. Heavy showers with thunderstorms are possible after the warning period and until dawn. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.
